entry.summary: ...A WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH TUESDAY... * Breezy trades of 25 to 30 mph with higher gusts will impact all islands of American Samoa through at least Tuesday... * TIMING...through Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Expect possible downed tree limbs as well as shifting of loose and unsecured small objects due to strong winds. entry.title: Fire Weather Watch issued September 19 at 2:32PM PDT until September 21 at 6:00PM PDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING THROUGH THURSDAY AFTERNOON FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR FIRE ZONES 213,215,216,217,263,266 AND 279... The National Weather Service in Sacramento has issued a Fire Weather Watch for gusty winds and low humidity, which is in effect from Wednesday evening through Thursday afternoon.
